diff_hunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,39 @@
+package(default_visibility = [
+    "//visibility:public",
+])
+
+licenses(["notice"])  # Apache 2.0
+
+load("//tensorflow:tensorflow.bzl", "tf_cc_binary")
+
+tf_cc_binary(
+    name = "label_image",
+    srcs = ["label_image.cc"],
+    deps = [
+        "//tensorflow/contrib/lite/kernels:builtin_ops",
+    ],
+    linkopts = select({
body: I guest you mean  `load("//tensorflow/contrib/lite:build_def.bzl", "tflite_linkopts")` instead of `load("//third_party/tensorflow/contrib/lite:build_def.bzl", "tflite_copts")`. That also works. However, `//tensorflow/contrib/lite/kernels:builtin_ops` needs `libm` but, for Android it's not included in tflite_linkopts(), so I'll use ` linkopts = tflite_linkopts() + ["-lm"]`

However, //tensorflow/contrib/lite/kernels:builtin_ops needs libm but, for Android it's not included in tflite_linkopts(), so I'll use linkopts = tflite_linkopts() + ["-lm"]
